title: The Book of (Even More) Awesome
description: From the author of the #1 International Bestseller "The Book of Awesome" and the award-winning, multimillion-hit website 1000awesomethings.com comes...EVEN MORE of the little things that make us smile every day!Neil Pasricha is back with a collection of hundreds more awesome things that deserve celebration There's even space for you to write your very own Awesome Things in the back.Because couldn't we all use (even more) AWESOME!?
author: Neil Pasricha
